name: Qranio
description: Qranio is an online platform where people can check their knowledge and get prizes. By signing up, users can choose a category and answer questions. For each correct answer they will receive a specific amount of iQ$ (virtual currency).
responsibilities: Art direction and design of the iOS app
Designed and programmed the Windows app
Designed elements of the Android app
challenges: Update the layout but keep the existing identity, redesigned all icons and images. Work alone in the design and implematation of the windows app
results: Working on a product's identity is a never-ending challenge, it always has something that can be improve or just might be different. But we managed to keep the deadlines for new versions and features during the year.

name: Docbrown
description: Illustration for 'DocBrown', a Brazilian brand of t-shirts.
challenges: We had some restriction like, size and number of colors so it was necessary to make many optimizations to obtain a result similar to the idealized
results: It was a successful partnership that lasted 2 years and several prints still in the market for sale.

name: Pedra Sul
description: Interactive app for estimating the amount of cement for constructions.
responsibilities: Designed of the iOS and Android apps
challenges: Create an interface with a visual and usability similar to the old one,(a paper disk card) that customers are used to.

name: Devoradores de Livros
description: Creation of elements and characters for avatars of the website 'Devoradores de Livros', a Brazilian website to encourage kids to read.
challenges: All clothes and accessories had to fit in the different types of monsters.
results: A new set of colorful clothes and accessories for avatars of the website.

name: Saramandaia
description: Interactive web and mobile app for the TV Show "O fantástico mundo de Saramandaia". In the mobile version you can interact with the characters and elements by touching and moving the device. Design and development of the front-end with HTML, CSS3 and JavaScript.
responsibilities: Designed and developed the mobile version
challenges: It had to work perfectly on all mobile devices and on the web
results: I had to make two versions to get the most of the touch feature on the mobile devices.

name: Vamos Desenhar

challenges: The real job was figuring out the best software because there were a lot of steps for each caracters.
